doc.title: Gesunde Gemeinde - Wohlbefinden beginnt im Kopf
doc.plot: Mens sana in corpore sano. Health and wellness are starting in our minds. The documentary is showing the efforts in Austria's education system that the children grow up with sports and healthy eating - on the Styriavitalis-project of Gesunde Gemeinde (healthy communities), which want to be an inspiring example for all villages and towns in health care.
